tag.name: background
tag.description: background is shorthand for setting the individual background properties

tag.name: background-attachment
tag.description: Specifies if the background is fixed to the viewport of if it scrolls, which is the default.

tag.name: background-color
tag.description: Sets the background colour

tag.name: background-image
tag.description: Sets an image to use as the background

tag.name: background-position
tag.description: Specifies the position of a background image if one is given

tag.name: background-repeat
tag.description: Controls tiling of background images

tag.name: border
tag.description: border is shorthand for setting the individual border properties on all four borders

tag.name: border-collapse
tag.description: border-collapse controls how borders are handled in tables

tag.name: border-color
tag.description: border-color is shorthand for setting the colour of all four borders

tag.name: border-spacing
tag.description: border-spacing controls the spacing between cell borders in tables

tag.name: border-style
tag.description: border-style is shorthand for setting the style of all four borders

tag.name: border-top
tag.description: border-top is shorthand for setting the style, colour and width of the top border

tag.name: border-right
tag.description: border-right is shorthand for setting the style, colour and width of the right hand border

tag.name: border-bottom
tag.description: border-bottom is shorthand for setting the style, colour and width of the bottom border

tag.name: border-left
tag.description: border-left is shorthand for setting the style, colour and width of the left hand border

tag.name: border-top-color
tag.description: border-top-color sets the colour of the top border

tag.name: border-right-color
tag.description: border-right-color sets the colour of the right hand border

tag.name: border-bottom-color
tag.description: border-bottom-color sets the colour of the bottom border

tag.name: border-left-color
tag.description: border-left-color sets the colour of the left hand border

tag.name: border-top-style
tag.description: border-top-style sets the style of the top border

tag.name: border-right-style
tag.description: border-right-style sets the style of the right hand border

tag.name: border-bottom-style
tag.description: border-bottom-style sets the style of the bottom border

tag.name: border-left-style
tag.description: border-left-style sets the style of the left hand border

tag.name: border-top-width
tag.description: border-top-width sets the width of the top border

tag.name: border-right-width
tag.description: border-right-width sets the width of the right hand border

tag.name: border-bottom-width
tag.description: border-bottom-width sets the width of the bottom border

tag.name: border-left-width
tag.description: border-left-width sets the width of the left hand border

tag.name: border-width
tag.description: border-width is shorthand for setting the width of all four borders

tag.name: bottom
tag.description: bottom specifies the offset from the bottom edge of the containing block

tag.name: caption-side
tag.description: caption-side specifies where a table caption will appear

tag.name: clear
tag.description: clear specifies which sides of an element may not have a earlier floating element next to them

tag.name: clip
tag.description: clip specifies the clipping rectangle for the element

tag.name: color
tag.description: color specifies the foreground colour to be used for text

tag.name: content
tag.description: content provides a way of inserting extra content into the document

tag.name: counter-increment
tag.description: Increment a named counter

tag.name: counter-reset
tag.description: Reset a named counter to 0, or a specified value

tag.name: cursor
tag.description: Set the mouse pointer to the specified type

tag.name: direction
tag.description: Sets the text direction, left to right, right to left, etc.

tag.name: display
tag.description: Controls how an element is rendered, if at all

tag.name: empty-cells
tag.description: Controls if empty cells in tables should be shown or not

tag.name: float
tag.description: Specifies if an element should float to the left or right, or not at all.

tag.name: font
tag.description: Shorthand for setting the individual font properties

tag.name: font-family
tag.description: The name of the font, or font family to use

tag.name: font-size
tag.description: Specifies how big the font should be

tag.name: font-size-adjust
tag.description: Set the aspect ratio of the font

tag.name: font-stretch
tag.description: Provides a way to stretch / squash the font

tag.name: font-style
tag.description: Specifies if the font should be italic, oblique, etc.

tag.name: font-variant
tag.description: Enables a variant of the font to be used, such as small-caps

tag.name: font-weight
tag.description: Specifies the weight of the font

tag.name: height
tag.description: Provides a height for an element

tag.name: left
tag.description: Specifies the offset of the left hand side of a positioned element

tag.name: letter-spacing
tag.description: Specifies the spacing between letters

tag.name: list-style
tag.description: A shorthand method of applying the list-style properties

tag.name: list-style-image
tag.description: Specifies an image that should be used as the marker in a list or list item

tag.name: list-style-position
tag.description: Used to control if the list marker is rendered inside or outside the actual list item

tag.name: list-style-type
tag.description: Specifies the type of marker to display, circle, square etc.

tag.name: margin
tag.description: A shorthand method for specifying the top, right, bottom, left margin widths / heights

tag.name: margin-top
tag.description: Specifies the height of the top margin on an element

tag.name: margin-right
tag.description: Specifies the width of the right hand margin on an element

tag.name: margin-bottom
tag.description: Specifies the height of the bottom margin on an element

tag.name: margin-left
tag.description: Specifies the width of the left hand margin on an element

tag.name: max-height
tag.description: Specidies a maximum height for an element, does not apply to table elements

tag.name: max-width
tag.description: Specidies a maximum width for an element, does not apply to table elements

tag.name: min-height
tag.description: Specidies a minimum height for an element, does not apply to table elements

tag.name: min-width
tag.description: Specidies a minimum width for an element, does not apply to table elements

tag.name: outline
tag.description: outline is shorthand for setting the individual outline properties on all sides of the box

tag.name: outline-color
tag.description: outline-color sets the colour of the outline on all sides of the box

tag.name: outline-style
tag.description: outline-style sets the style of the outline on all sides of the box

tag.name: outline-width
tag.description: outline-width sets the width of the outline on all sides of the box

tag.name: overflow
tag.description: controls how content that does not fit inside its element should be handled

tag.name: content
tag.description: content provides a way of inserting extra content into the document

tag.name: content
tag.description: content provides a way of inserting extra content into the document

tag.name: content
tag.description: content provides a way of inserting extra content into the document

tag.name: outline
tag.description: outline is shorthand for setting the individual outline properties on all sides of the box

tag.name: outline-color
tag.description: outline-color sets the colour of the outline on all sides of the box

tag.name: outline-style
tag.description: outline-style sets the style of the outline on all sides of the box

tag.name: outline-width
tag.description: outline-width sets the width of the outline on all sides of the box
